title: Great 1BR condo, Center City
description:

***ASK FOR VIDEO TOUR-will email you link***
***Available for MARCH 1st/early March move-in***

title: You will find the perfect combination of interior and exterior space
description: One of only eight twin townhomes of its kind, you will find the perfect combination of interior and exterior space, with a long driveway leading to a one car garage, front/side and rear yard space, THREE levels of living, and modern amenities in this 2010 gem. Pull up the driveway to an architecturally pleasing front elevation with stone and large windows- this home has a true presence. Through the front door is a tiled foyer with coat closet and interior access to your 1 car garage. This level also offers a 4th bedroom or home office, as it boasts a powder room, 9 ft. ceilings, closet and large egress window. A neutral paint color, recessed lighting and carpet round out this space. Up the hardwood stairs with tasteful wrought iron spindles to the second level- a spacious and open main level with sliding doors to the outdoor space that must be seen to be truly appreciated. Your little slice of suburbia awaits with a paver patio, perfect for gatherings and grilling, or just relaxing with your morning coffee. This space also offers endless views, as you do not have other homes directly behind you- a rarity in this area. The yard is landscaped with dramatic stone boulder walls, and stunning skyline views of historic Manayunk, Gladwyne, and Belmont Hills. Pet lovers- this is the place for you, as your pup will have plenty of room to roam with the sizable back and side yard space. The mature trees that line the property make for privacy and a pleasing backyard aesthetic. Back inside,this level boasts hardwood flooring throughout, recessed lighting and a neutral wall color. The kitchen has an abundance of granite counter space, including a peninsula fit to comfortably sit four. The 42" cabinets are crafted by "Merillat" and the drawers offer high quality dovetail construction. There is a SS LG side by side refrigerator, Samsung SS dishwasher, GE oven and cooktop with a tasteful Broan Elite range hood above. The corner undermount sink is perfectly situated under the windows for a view of the backyard. There is a spacious storage pantry, making this kitchen fit to  all of your "overflow" items. There is a conveniently located powder room on this level and yet another coat closet- this home comes with plenty of storage options. The 3rd level offers brand new luxury vinyl plank in a hue that compliments the hardwood flooring perfectly! The seamless and polished look that this flooring brings to this level truly elevates the modern feel of the space. There are three bedrooms, one being the main bedroom with en suite bathroom with double vanity and large spa shower with neat pebble tile flooring. Dual walk-in closets, wood blinds and a ceiling fan complete this updated space. The washer and dryer are located in the hallway closet-no more hauling laundry up the stairs! The hall and main bathrooms have some modern detailed tile work- the owners spent their money in all of the right places!

title: Looking for the Perfect Location, This Property Has a Unique Floor Pla
description:
Welcome to 776 S 3rd Street! If you are looking for the perfect location, this property checks all the boxes for you in Queen Village. This property has a unique floor plan and tons of character that just works! Enter the condo through a private entrance. Walk inside to a Foyer with exposed brick and a large coat closet. To the left is a cute Sitting Room that can be used as a Dining Room with tons of light and Glass Sliding Doors leading to a private patio. The Kitchen has a Large Pantry, Quartz Countertops, Stainless Steel Appliances, and Tile Backsplash. There is a cute powder room with exposed brick and marble floors on the floor as well. Walk up the stairway with a Wall of Exposed Brick on your left leading you to a Large 2nd Floor Living Room with Hardwood Floors and Tons of Natural Light. There is also a separate room with hardwood floors and a window that can be used as a third bedroom, office or workout room. Walk up a level to a large front bedroom that has tons of natural sunlight with 3 Bay Windows Across, Exposed Brick, Walk-in Closet and a vanity with sink. There is a full bathroom and a second bedroom with a Juliet Balcony. The basement has tons of space of storage and laundry machines. The owner will also include the furniture if needed for a small upcharge. Located in the desirable Meredith catchment. Queen Village Mews also has a gorgeous Landscaped Common Courtyard in the rear of the building. Amazing Queen Village location with Mario Lanza Park / dog park nearby and countless great shops and restaurants within easy walking distance.

description:
This cheery 570 SF studio offers a spacious 18 x 7 balcony, one of the most private in the building. Large windows and the 14th-floor location allow you a captivating view of the city by day and night. The open-concept living room features wood laminate flooring and an easy transition to the kitchen with a bar-height counter. The 2020 bathroom remodel offers a walk-in shower and additional generous storage. The building’s commercial area boasts a grocery store, restaurant/bar, bank, and pharmacy for everyday needs. title: Nestled on a leafy side street in the heart of Northern Liberties, you
description:
Nestled on a leafy side street in the heart of Northern Liberties, your new home awaits at 924 N Randolph Street. This 3-story brick front home offers the perfect city refuge, within easy walking distance to a fantastic array of restaurants, shops and entertainment. Enter the open concept living area greeted by a lovely wood-burning fireplace with original stone mantelpiece, warm hardwood floors, high ceilings and charming original woodwork details. The classic black and white kitchen houses a full suite of appliances-including a dishwasher and brand-new refrigerator. The skylight affords wonderful natural light. Out back just beyond the kitchen is the spacious and private rear patio with space for relaxing & entertaining, and gardening in the built-in planter bed. Downstairs the unfinished basement has lots of dry storage and updated mechanicals. Up on the 2nd floor you’ll find a full laundry room—no more hauling heavy baskets to the basement! Plus, the large bathroom and a sunny east facing bedroom. The 3rd floor offers 2 more bedrooms with a lovely natural light throughout. Outside, just about everything you need can be found within walking distance including a grocery store, pet store, hardware store, bowling alley, gyms, salons, and public transportation. Favorite restaurants such as Cantina dos Segundos, Bardot Café, Honey’s, Ortleibs, North Third and Federal Donuts make it easy to see why this is one of the most popular neighborhoods in Philadelphia.
